name: Simple Board (Miz-Jam-1)
description:
This is my submission for the Miz-Jam-1. As the title states, it's a simple board game. It's not a finished product by any means and rather it was more of a learning project revolving around path-finding and grid-based movement (somewhat like Chess).

This is a multiplayer game meant to be played on one device. Play until an opponent has run out of characters to control.
